SELECT count(*)counter FROM cms_work t where 1=1
and t.name like '%' || #{name} || '%'
and t.taskno like '%' || #{taskno} || '%'
and t.taskname like '%' || #{taskname} || '%'
AND t.createdate >= #{datestart} AND t.createdate <=#{dateend}
and (t.touser=#{touser} or t.createuser=#{touser})
and t.isfinish=#{isfinish}
and t.createuser in (select usercode from sys_user where orgid in(select id from ggs.sys_org t start with t.id=#{orgid} connect by prior t.id=t.pid) )

select t.touser,t3.username,t.counter totalcount,nvl(t2.counter,0)finishcount,round(nvl(t2.counter,0)/t.counter,1)*100 percent from( select touser,count(*)counter from cms_work t where 1=1 AND t.createdate >= #{datestart} AND t.createdate <=#{dateend}
and t.touser in (select usercode from sys_user where orgid in(select id from ggs.sys_org t start with t.id=#{orgid} connect by prior t.id=t.pid) )
group by t.touser)t
left join ( select touser,count(*)counter from cms_work t where t.isfinish='1' AND t.createdate >= #{datestart} AND t.createdate <=#{dateend}
and t.touser in (select usercode from sys_user where orgid in(select id from ggs.sys_org t start with t.id=#{orgid} connect by prior t.id=t.pid) )
group by t.touser)t2 on t.touser=t2.touser left join sys_user t3 on t.touser=t3.usercode
order by percent desc

select t5.name orgname,t.usercode,t.username,t2.*,nvl(t3.counter,0) totalcount,nvl(t4.counter,0) finishcount,round(nvl(t4.counter,0)/t3.counter,1)*100 percent,nvl(t6.counter,0) totalfinishcount,t7.counter unfinishcount from ggs.sys_user t left join ( select t.touser,sum(t.monday)monday,sum(t.tuesday)tuesday,sum(t.wednesday)wednesday,sum(t.thursday)thursday,sum(t.friday)friday from ggs.cms_work t where 1=1 AND t.createdate >= #{datestart} AND t.createdate <=#{dateend}
or (t.isfinish!='1' and (t.updatedate >= #{datestart} and t.updatedate <=#{dateend}))
group by t.touser)t2 on t.usercode=t2.touser left join ( select touser,count(*)counter from cms_work t where 1=1 AND t.createdate >= #{datestart} AND t.createdate <=#{dateend} group by t.touser)t3 on t3.touser=t.usercode left join ( select touser,count(*)counter from cms_work t where t.isfinish='1' AND t.createdate >= #{datestart} AND t.createdate <=#{dateend} group by t.touser)t4 on t4.touser=t.usercode left join ( select touser,count(*)counter from cms_work t where t.isfinish='1' AND t.finishdate >= #{datestart} AND t.finishdate <=#{dateend} group by t.touser)t6 on t6.touser=t.usercode left join ( select touser,count(*)counter from cms_work t where t.isfinish!='1' AND t.createdate <=#{dateend} group by t.touser)t7 on t7.touser=t.usercode left join sys_org t5 on t5.id=t.orgid where 1=1
and t.orgid in(select id from ggs.sys_org t start with t.id=#{orgid} connect by prior t.id=t.pid)
and t5.name like '%' || #{orgname} || '%'
order by t.usercode

select t.*,t2.counter finish_counter from ( select to_char(to_date(t.createdate,'yyyy-mm-dd'),'iw')weeks,count(*)counter from cms_work t where 1=1
and t.createuser in (select usercode from sys_user where orgid in(select id from ggs.sys_org t start with t.id=#{orgid} connect by prior t.id=t.pid) )
group by to_char(to_date(t.createdate,'yyyy-mm-dd'),'iw'))t left join ( select to_char(to_date(t.finishdate,'yyyy-mm-dd'),'iw')weeks,count(*)counter from cms_work t where t.isfinish='1'
and t.createuser in (select usercode from sys_user where orgid in(select id from ggs.sys_org t start with t.id=#{orgid} connect by prior t.id=t.pid) )
group by to_char(to_date(t.finishdate,'yyyy-mm-dd'),'iw') )t2 on t.weeks=t2.weeks where rownum < 10 order by t.weeks

select t.*,t.name username,nvl(t2.counter,0)totalcount,nvl(t3.counter,0)finishcount from sys_org t left join ( select b.orgid,count(*)counter from cms_work a left join sys_user b on a.touser=b.usercode where 1=1 AND a.createdate >= #{datestart} AND a.createdate <=#{dateend} group by b.orgid)t2 on t.id=t2.orgid left join ( select b.orgid,count(*)counter from cms_work a left join sys_user b on a.touser=b.usercode where a.isfinish=1 AND a.createdate >= #{datestart} AND a.createdate <=#{dateend} group by b.orgid)t3 on t.id=t3.orgid

select t5.name orgname,t.usercode,t.username,nvl(t3.counter,0) totalcount,nvl(t4.counter,0) finishcount from ggs.sys_user t left join ( select touser,count(*)counter from cms_work t where 1=1 AND t.createdate >= #{datestart} AND t.createdate <=#{dateend} group by t.touser)t3 on t3.touser=t.usercode left join ( select touser,count(*)counter from cms_work t where t.isfinish='1' AND t.createdate >= #{datestart} AND t.createdate <=#{dateend} group by t.touser)t4 on t4.touser=t.usercode left join sys_org t5 on t5.id=t.orgid where 1=1
and t5.name like '%' || #{orgname} || '%'
order by t.usercode
select * from ( select t2.username,t.* from cms_log t left join sys_user t2 on t.createuser=t2.usercode where t.objid=#{id} and t.objtype='cmswork' order by t.SYSOPERTIME desc)where rownum<=20
